name: ListOrganizationRepositories
description:
Retrieve repositories for a specific organization on GitHub.

Fetches a list of repositories belonging to a specified organization on GitHub. Admin permissions or ownership may be required to access certain repository details.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of repositories to return, such as 'all', 'public', 'private', etc. Note: 'internal' is unsupported with an installation access token.

value_schema.description: Specifies the types of repositories you want returned. `internal` is not yet supported when a GitHub App calls this endpoint with an installation access token.

parameters.name: sort_property
parameters.description: Specifies the property to sort the repository results by, such as created, updated, pushed, or full_name.

value_schema.description: The property to sort the results by.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting order of the results. Use 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending.

value_schema.description: The order to sort by. Default: `asc` when using `full_name`, otherwise `desc`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of repository results to display per page, with a maximum limit of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch, used for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
